name: Glow Block Puzzle - Rotate!
description:
This is a very classic game. But once you play, you'll be hooked.
Promise me, don't play this game at work.

Tap & drop blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on the board both vertically and horizontally.
Remember, block can be ROTATED. Try to ROTATE BLOCK when it is not fit.
Easy to play and suitable for all ages - kid or elderly, man or woman, boy or girl.
Clear more blocks and you'll get high scores!

You can play it anytime, anywhere. No need of wifi or internet. No time limit.
Funny music and awesome effects.
Enjoy, Download Glow Block Puzzle - Rotate now & Have fun!
